Description: Daily 4-km gridded meteorological variables for the contiguous US
Monthly high-resolution (~4 km) global climate data including temperature
16-day composite global vegetation indices (NDVI & EVI) at 1-km resolution
Monthly global land surface model outputs (FEWS NET FLDAS Noah) – precipitation
Daily global land surface variables (incl. soil moisture and evapotranspiration) from GLDAS-2.2 (Catchment model with GRACE DA)
Daily 1-km gridded weather data for North America: max/min temperature
